content: {"locationId": "3236", "organizationId": "2794", "name": "Soup Kitchen In Provincetown, Inc.", "address1": "10 Shank Painter Road", "address2": "", "city": "Provincetown", "state": "MA", "zipCode": "02657", "country": null, "phone": "508-487-8331", "phoneExt": "", "website": "http://www.skipfood.org/", "latitude": "42.0482583", "longitude": "-70.1923955", "foodPrograms": "Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Soup Kitchen in Provincetown - SKIP - was founded in 1992. Our mission is: 1) to provide nutritious meals in a welcoming environment open to all, 2) to provide a sense of community to those experiencing isolation during the resort community's long off-season and 3) where possible, provide formal and informal referrals for a range of social services including but not limited to housing and mental health. SKIP does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, national origin, disability or veteran status in any of its activities or operations and is not affiliated with any religious or political organization.", "notes": "SKIP is located in the Provincetown United Methodist Church", "contactName": "John Strumwasser", "contactPhone": "508-487-8331", "contactEmail": "office@skipfood.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Indoor Service", "dietRestrictions": "Dairy Free, Gluten Free, Vegan, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "Prepared Food / Grab and Go, Sit Down Meals", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 26, "regionName": "The Greater Boston Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "fe65478e-80f9-4330-b719-d2afc58262f8.png", "website": "https://www.gbfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Every Day 12:30 PM-1:30 PM (Historically November thru April)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
